title: Levi's Women's A-Line Denim Skirt - Blue Denim - Size M
description: The Levi's Women's A-Line Denim Skirt in Blue Denim is a timeless piece that combines classic style with modern comfort. This skirt features a flattering A-line silhouette that creates a gentle flare from the waist, enhancing your figure with a stylish, yet comfortable fit. The high-quality denim fabric ensures durability, while the mid-length design that reaches just above the knee offers versatility for various occasions. With traditional five-pocket styling, a button-front closure, and a zipper, this skirt is perfect for both casual and semi-formal wear.
key_features: Classic A-line silhouette for a flattering fit
High-quality blue denim fabric for durability
Five-pocket styling with button-front closure and zipper
meta_title: Levi's Women's A-Line Denim Skirt - Blue Denim - Size M
meta_description: Shop Levi's Women's A-Line Denim Skirt in Blue Denim. Featuring a classic A-line silhouette, high-quality denim, and a flattering mid-length design. Ideal for casual and semi-formal wear. Size M available.

title: Levi's Women's A-Line Denim Skirt - Blue Denim - Size L
description: The Levi's Women's A-Line Denim Skirt in Blue Denim is a stylish and versatile addition to your wardrobe. This classic A-line skirt features a flattering silhouette with a gentle flare from the waist, crafted from high-quality denim for long-lasting wear. The mid-length cut that reaches just above the knee makes it suitable for various occasions, from casual outings to semi-formal events. With five-pocket styling and a button-front closure with a zipper, this skirt offers both functionality and fashion.
key_features: A-line silhouette with a mid-length design
Versatile for casual and semi-formal occasions
